website_summaries.verdict: Polar fleece blanket feels great against your skin, and it also keeps you warm.
pros: Power cord plugs directly into vehicle power outlet but draws a minimum amperage so you won't drain your car's battery too fast
Long power cord at 7 feet, so the blanket reaches into the back seat
cons: Blanket may not heat to a high enough temperature for some people

website_summaries.verdict: This blanket shouldn't drain your car's battery, thanks to its low amperage. But it may not get warm and toasty, either.
pros: Low amperage draw helps to keep from draining your car's battery
Measures 43 inches L by 59 inches W.  Heats up quickly
cons: Blanket may not get as warm as customers expected
Heat may be centralized rather than radiating throughout blanket

customer_reviews.title: Plenty large enough for 2
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my wife's first ever night of popup camping, I did NOT want her to be put off by being cold. This did the trick for sure. Ran on a Group 24, 110Ah battery for 8+ hours each night and didn't pull the battery down to 50%. We put it on the mattress and slept on top of it with a comforter and we were completely warm all night. Excellent, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Ran Two All Night Off Our Car Battery
customer_reviews.text: We chose these blankets because they were one of the few that didn’t automatically turn off. We used these car camping and ran two of them all night off the car battery of our Ram 1500 (not running) with no problems. Our ARE truck cap has three 12v receptacles that worked perfectly. Not the coziest or attractive fabric, and I wish they were bigger, but these did the job. Keep in mind that like most electric blankets they need some insulation to get them nice and hot. We layered these bad boys in with our other bed comforters and were quite toasty sleeping in 20°F temperatures in our truck camper.
customer_reviews.author: Sirin

customer_reviews.title: Kept my pups warm
customer_reviews.text: I have a motorcycle trailer that actually is designed to carry my two dogs. While on a road trip I knew it was going to get cold so I ordered this blanket. I'm glad I did because it did get cold and plugging this up for them worked very well. They had there sweaters on and laying on this blanket was more than enough. They stayed comfortable and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Sending back!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sending back!!! It barely warmed up ... and when I say barely ...I wasn’t quite sure that it did at all!! There wasn’t any kind of control and then top it off there was a warning for harmful chemicals including lead!!!! WTF??
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was puzzled by some of the reviews so I felt compelled to write. The plug fits the cigarette lighter perfectly (someone said theirs didn't but mine was fine). It heats up quickly and is nice and toasty warm!
customer_reviews.author: Words and Stories

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle bunny
customer_reviews.text: Ok, takes a while to heat up and doesn't get too hot like a blanket at home would. It's a good product and does provide also me extra warmth for them children in the back seat (tip, two blankets is definitely the way to go for multiple boys). I have 9 and 11 year old boys, and a though the blanket is large enough to share, it is not worth the bickering of "he has more blanket then Me". I got two blankets and it helps after a day of sledding in the mountains or just enjoying a day in the snow. About 5-10 mins, you can feel the warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Jbpage67

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE FIGHTING over the car heater.
customer_reviews.text: My 90 year old father, who is freezing all the time, just loves it! One problem solved: all winter, we battle with the heater in the car; he wants it blasting hot, so he can huddle next to the heating vent, while I drive with the window down (if you saw us, you'd giggle.) This blanket warms, immediately, and the fabric is 'luxuriously' soft on his delicate, elderly skin. So, I too, love this blanket!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife to warm her up on car trips. Its the perfect temp. She stays warm on cold winter days before car warms up and she doesnt crank up the heat and sweat me out.
customer_reviews.author: PaveHawk Gunner

customer_reviews.title: 12v blankets barely get warm
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 3 of these 12v blankets with the cigarette lighter plug and none of them get warm at all. I think it is more a limitation of those 12v plugs, but come on guys why sell a product that doesn’t do what it’s supposed to do?? Make me a 12v blanket without the cig plug and I’ll wire it myself. So disappointed in all of these blankets. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Well Received Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Mother. She loves it. Says it is really warm. One of those things that you don't know how much you will enjoy it until you have it. Only bad thing is the digital readout does not work. Hate that there is something defective on the gift I gave, but she isn't willing to give it up to get a replacement. :)
customer_reviews.author: fatcattn

customer_reviews.title: This is great if you have people that chill easily while traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you have people that chill easily while traveling. I just wish it had a off/on switch and a high/low switch. Guess I should have read it better but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: tlsl

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought this a few times and everyone loves it
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one for a Christmas present a couple years ago for my sister in law. Last year I ended up buying a couple more for Christmas presents and ended up keeping one for myself. My daughter loves using it in the morning to keep warm on her way to school. I ended up buying this last one again to give to my sister in law because her other one got ruined.
customer_reviews.author: kassi foster

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this blanket! Midwest winters can be brutal and this little gem keeps me warm and toasty from point A to point B! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Heitman

customer_reviews.title: Quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: Small, plug in on not plugged in off. I am an over the road truck driver and sleep on a heated blanket every night. Last one gave out (another brand) after 6 mos (heating element gave out). This made it all of 5 uses before I went to unplug it in the morning and the plug came flying apart. Found the fuse and spring but have yet to find the tip. Ended up paying double to replace on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn E

customer_reviews.title: gentle warming blanket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice blanked but does not as warm as I had hoped. I have run it all night and did not seem to draw down my RV batteries much. If you are looking for a gentle warm this is a good blanket. It does not have a timer turning it off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schell

customer_reviews.title: Would make great Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.text: It's not a super thick electric blanket, but that's probably better for the car. I bought 3 as gifts, and all love it and say that it's super soft. For one, who has heated seats, he uses it as a lap blanket to get more warmth. The other 2 sit on them and create the heated seats, lol. Either way, I am very pleased with them and would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: LDurham

customer_reviews.title: Thick and works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot thicker than I anticipated. It is well worth spending less, compared to what others are asking. It doesn't get super hot, but it does the job. I bought it for cold day/night rides in our SXS. I liked it so much, I bought one for my daughter as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It warms up a bit (not to warm) after maybe about 20 to 25 minutes, does pull the volts though, left it on for a few hours without the car running (when I had been shutting it off/unplugging it, but left it on by mistake) and then had to jump the car to get it started. Not worth the dollars I paid in the end.
customer_reviews.author: arcticdj

customer_reviews.title: Barely warmer than a regular cover.
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't heat up as much as expected. I bought this and another one from a different vendor and there was major differences the other product was much warmer and a better quality. This product even started to come unstiched after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: The charger that connects to the car comes apart, not good.
customer_reviews.text: My blanket stoped working after a month of use. Also when I unplugged the blanket from the car the charger that connects to the car comes apart and causes little parts to fall out. Like a fuse, spring, a small cap and a metal thing and wouldn’t turn on after I put all the pieces back in. I called the manufacturer and they said to contact amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color 😢
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that it was not the color of the picture that I thought I was buying. I am glad I didn't order everyone in the family for Christmas Just black and red cheap looking I will try it out tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat
customer_reviews.text: This product was plugged into my T@G camper and it never got even warm to the touch, certainly it never got anything close to hot. . There are no heat settings. I know that it was on because the indicator light was on. AND the indicator light is very bright btw when you're trying to sleep. I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The plaid wasn't like the picture showed, and it doesn't turn on and off, nor can you adjust the heat in any way. It is on the soft side but not wow kind of soft. It warms up in the car but doesn't get very hot.... just warm. I'm keeping it in my car in case I get caught in a snow storm and can't get home
customer_reviews.author: Mammaknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: Worked once, then failed
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it when I bought it last summer...made sure it worked. Packed it into the RV. Plugged in this morning (when I need it)... doesn’t work. After 2 hours there was one small area where it was a bit warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie33kate

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is soft and close to the dimensions they stated. The power cord is long but NO temp control. It only gets warm and that is it, so in a very cold night you will need something else.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold mornings!
customer_reviews.text: My friend got one of these for Christmas and I just had to get it for myself! Perfect for those super cold mornings. Heats up very quickly, much faster than my car’s heater!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bought for coworker for camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a coworker for camping and she says its lovely and works and bought one for me while I drive around in the winter and i love it for that extra comfort!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyIvette

customer_reviews.title: Sending back
customer_reviews.text: No adjustment or off in switch. Only plug in and it heats up. Will be sending this back. The type of material it's made from is not high quality and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: No control
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little heated blanket. It doesn't have a control. And doesn't get quite as warm as I'd like. I got a converter to use in the house as well as the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Blanket does not heat up to a good temperature to keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: Blanket does not heat up to a good temperature to keep you warm.Could be defective ...the reason for purchasing the reviews were good.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Heater part faulty/ insufficient
customer_reviews.text: This product did not have any noticeable additional warmth when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I downgraded my car which no longer has heated seats so this blanket sits under me anchored by my head rest and it does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for taking the chill out when first getting in the vehicle. I loved that I was able to add extra warmth to my legs during the cold morning commutes.
customer_reviews.author: Traci S

customer_reviews.title: Does not warm up.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this blanket. I could barely feel any heat. I had it plugged in for an hour hoping it would heat up more but it never did. It's a shame since it's a cute blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O.

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece we were playing the game for Christmas where you pick a gift and then the next person could choose another gift or take the person's before you well she got this and loved it but it for stolen from her. She was so upset so ii bought this one for her and she's loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this blanket. Worked for less than a month and now it won't heat up at all. Not a reliable blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you unplug it if your car is off
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. My car heater stopped working and we had to figure out away four me to stay warm until i hit it fixed. Great warmth and fast. Whatever you do UNPLUG it before you turn your car off. It will kill your battery in about 2 hours if your vehicle is not running. Happened to me twice.
customer_reviews.author: Donna and Terry Burnworth

customer_reviews.title: Use as intended
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves her heated planket for Christmas had to try it out soon as she got said it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cat toasty warm in the car
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. She’s a little old lady and it keeps her warm in the car—she’s a little adventurer and goes everywhere. We live up north and it’s chilly about 6 months of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Amzncustmr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes roll down the window when he drives and I get so cold. We drove to WV last week and I am so glad I bought this blanket. It has a long cord and the blanket is very soft. The temperature was just right. I stayed nice and warm. Would definitely make an awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast and works great
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is a life saver! My car isn’t fancy enough to have seat warmers, so this is my alternative. In the winter time while I’m waiting for my car to defrost and warm up, I plus this blanket in to warm me up too. It heats up fast and works great! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot mild warm only
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected does not heat up Won’t even take chill away
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Great during winter
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Tried to buy again as a gift and wasn’t available!! I Live in Michigan, have to be driven two hours for infusions/cancer treatments and my car doesn’t have heated seats. This was great before/after in the car. Plugged into my outlet in the car, warmed up quick.
customer_reviews.author: LeeciR

customer_reviews.title: A little stiff, but, hopeful that's because it's new.
customer_reviews.text: A little slow to warm up, but, keeps me toasty. So far, it's worth the purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: PATTI

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because it has no switch or settings!
customer_reviews.text: heats ok but it's not controllable and doesn't have a on-off switch. you have to plug an unplug to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jim lainly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great gift
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to heat up but then gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Barter

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Wish I had bought a long time ago! Ordering another one for a gift! Just remember to unplug when you get out of your vehicle and don’t need it then.
customer_reviews.author: Beth23

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it! Now she wants it to where ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it! Now she wants it to where she can keep it running while sitting at the ball games.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Heats up faster then my car. Second one I bought
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dann

customer_reviews.title: dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I saw the mixed reviews but I took a chance. I was one of the many unlucky ones who got a worthless blanket that was dead on arrival. It is soft but does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for the wife. She has been very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Boring

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable could be warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Got it for jeep when top and doors are off at night. Could be warmer tho.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I felt almost no heat!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I received a defective one or not, but there isn't much heat at all coming from this thing!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Faulty product!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Did not heat up ever and made horrible sounds as though it might explode!
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Car blanket
customer_reviews.text: No temp control, will get warm and is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the concept. dislike the ability to use indoors w/110
customer_reviews.author: PANCAKE SIX

customer_reviews.title: Worked only 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Oct 1, 2019 and as of two days ago the blanket is no longer getting remotely warm. In addition the return window for this product is now closed after trying to return the product. My lost I am assuming but I hope this review help others.
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great! Wish it had a heat setting though!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: It's warm!
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older Ford pickup and it takes forever for the heater to warm up. I bought this to keep me warm while I am waiting. Works great, however there is no temperature control or even an on/off button. It plugs into the cigarette lighter socket .
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: No heat/terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible.....i plugged it into my teardrop and left it on for 20 min to see if it would warm up and nothing....no heat at all save your money...will be returning and buying something different
customer_reviews.author: DarcieG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use in the car when the weather is cold in hopes that it would be warm while the car is heating up, but it doesn't get very warm, and takes a while to heat up. Overall not really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Faye Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not what was shown in the picture..
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same blanket as the picture showed. It came in very cheap packaging that broke immediately as I picked it up. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Alli Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality not a good buy. If your gonna spend this much on a blanket just buy a regular fluffy blanket. If not yew just need to spend the extra $$$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Medical Patients, too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girl friend who gets cold very easily. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Z.

customer_reviews.title: She travels a lot and we live in Wisconsin so I thought it would be a good blanket in case of trouble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Neighbor. She travels a lot and we live in Wisconsin so I thought it would be a good blanket in case of trouble. She liked it alot
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is “the tits”
customer_reviews.text: This blanket provided my frail girlish figure not built for the Midwest with proper heat as I drive. I even have heated seats; I plug this bitch in and curl it up in my lap and all of my wildest dreams come true
customer_reviews.author: Rappstar609

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money on this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a month later I plugged it in it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If a gift tell person receiving it to let you know if it stops working
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter she loved it, but after a couple weeks it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: No On/Off switch or temp. control!
customer_reviews.text: There is only one heat setting, ON. You must unplug the blanket completely to turn off. It heats up well and is a decent size. It also has a long cord which is helpful. Overall great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Spookals The Cat

customer_reviews.title: Warm but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough, was warm not too hot just comfortable enough to survive the cold mornings and nights I'm in my car. But the piece that plugs in just broke so it doesnt work anymore. I bought this less than 2 weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not produce any noticeable heat when plugged in. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion not worth the extra money for an annoying attached wire that really doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Cute blanket but when I used it in my car it blew a fuse. It did get warmish but nothing a regular blanket couldn't do after a little while of having it on your lap. In my opinion not worth the extra money for an annoying attached wire that really doesn't do much.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of these total one of them wouldn't heat up at all when I received it and I got a replacement for it but I bought other brands of this same style of blanket from Amazon and had much better luck elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good for emergencies or even on chilly nights for the drive-in! Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ausman

customer_reviews.title: The size and cord length are perfect even for 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in our Polaris RZR. The size and cord length are perfect even for 2. I understand the reasoning why but which is could be a little warmer. I haven't tried adding a blanket on top which I have heard helps hold the heat in better. Otherwise, no issues or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Picture pattern not real!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is not the one that showed up! Still works great, however not the pictures blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is nice though, might try to open up the circuit ...
customer_reviews.text: Dead on Arrival. The fabric is nice though, might try to open up the circuit and see if there's anything I can fix to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Warms
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the wife and she loves it. If your wife is ALWAYS cold in the car, get it so you dont have to die.
customer_reviews.author: daniel lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work good in our side by side donating get super hot but really helps when it’s 10 below
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Warms up fast. It’s cozy. A must have for winter
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hudgens

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and Product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. We spend a lot of time in the mountains hunting and exploring. This blanket worked great when we’d get back to the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Huelter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Kept her warm durning last nights return home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casper Weigant

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had the blanket on for 30 mins and it didn't heat much at all, also there is no way to control or adjust heat levels on the blanket
customer_reviews.author: francisco caceres

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using this in a 1965 VW bus (which has minimal heat!). Had it on our laps on a drive across the country last winter. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele (.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. spend money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Came in the wrong color, and doesn't really work. It may heat up slightly in one specific spot, but is definitely not worth the money. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Puts off little heat but works pretty good if you put another blanket on top of it.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me, husband gets too hot and I stayed cold, no more. Used this in my car and we both were comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Can not go WRONG
customer_reviews.text: Totally perfect. I got all 3 of my daughters one for Christmas. They love them!!

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted the reviews. This blanket does not get warm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Son'ja Scott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best Amazon purchase I have ever made! Heats up quickly and keeps me warm for my long commute to work!

customer_reviews.title: Not very warming when you’re desperate for warmth in a truck without heat.
customer_reviews.text: It does not get very warm. It’s like some areas of the blanket doesn’t heat at all.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bus b and has enjoyed it. Needs a temp control and on off switch
customer_reviews.author: Janice L Joiner

customer_reviews.title: the blanket is a nice material but it doesn't get as hot as we ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get real warm, the blanket is a nice material but it doesn't get as hot as we expected.

customer_reviews.text: I like it. Doesn't get real hot but take the chill off.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Just played 18 holes on Black Friday. Very cold while swinging but got nice and warm under blanket.

customer_reviews.title: Electric car blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes the commute more comfortable in frigid temperatures

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: when it is cold and you have to drive anywhere this is a must. I heats up fast and does not get too warm. LOVE It

customer_reviews.text: Does not heat up fast. Will take 2 hours to heat up. Not happy but it is soft

customer_reviews.text: It did not heat up, I waited about 10 minutes, tried 3 different times.
customer_reviews.author: Spliffsamo

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought to give dog a warm(not hot) place to lay

product_meta.title: Camco Polar Fleece Heated Blanket for Cars, Trucks, and RVs - Power Cord Plugs into 12V Vehicle Power Outlet | Great for Cold Weather, Traveling, or Emergencies - Plaid Red (42804)
product_meta.description: The Camco Heated Blanket is a useful addition to your car's emergency kit. The heavy duty 7-foot power cord plugs directly into your car's power outlet, and the low amperage draw means that you won't quickly drain the car battery. The 100 percent polar fleece and comforting warmth of the Camco Heated Blanket also make it great for traveling and camping on cool nights.
feature_bullets: Power cord plugs directly into 12 volt vehicle power outlet
Low amperage draw helps to not drain your car's battery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars415 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
